Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
ClickShare Hub is one of the first modular room system devices built on the Microsoft Device Ecosystem Platform (MDEP). Designed for IT admins and everyday users alike, this modular solution simplifies setup, boosts engagement, and future-proofs your meeting spaces. Learn how ClickShare Hub empowers smarter, more inclusive meetings.
